title: Cash Splash 2020, STURGIS WAS V BAD 9.8.20
itunes:title: Cash Splash 2020, STURGIS WAS V BAD 9.8.20
description:
In episode 711, Jack and Miles are joined by Revision Path podcast co-host Maurice Cherry to discuss Trump's net worth losing it's worth, the Sturgis Motorcycle Rally being linked to over 250k coronavirus cases, the Tokyo Olympics, wildfires and climate change, gender reveal parties, inside Ellen's home, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump eyes spending $100M of his own money in reelection bid: report
  2. Trump's net worth fell $600 million in last year: Forbes
  3. How Trump’s Billion-Dollar Campaign Lost Its Cash Advantage 
  4. Sturgis Motorcycle Rally Is Now Linked to More Than 250,000 Coronavirus Cases
  5. Tokyo Olympics: Games will go ahead 'with or without Covid', says IOC VP
  6. Tokyo Olympics Will Happen Next Year Despite Virus, IOC’s Coates Says
  7. Stop Blaming Climate Change For California’s Fires. Many Forests, Including The Redwoods, Need Them.
  8. Lightning, fire and burning forests: Climate change in California
  9. The Influencer Responsible for Gender Reveal Parties Has a Few Regrets
  10. EXCLUSIVE: 'She treated us like we were nothing.' Ellen DeGeneres ran household like boot camp, tormenting workers over misplaced salt shakers, 'taking pleasure' in firings and 'laying traps' like matchsticks to test employees, ex staffer claims
  11. WATCH: Sacha Rudy - Be a Man

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
